en: Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind

description.zh-cn: 中国文化大革命末期由毛泽东发起的最后一次大规模政治运动，旨在批判邓小平在1975年推行的整顿政策。
description.en: The last large-scale political movement of the Cultural Revolution in China, initiated by Mao Zedong to criticize the rectification policies implemented by Deng Xiaoping in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. He served as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from 1978 until his retirement in 1989. He was the core of the second generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership and the chief architect of Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国的领导人之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指中国文化大革命后期，由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成的政治集团。
description.en: A political faction composed of four Chinese Communist Party officials: Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen, who came to prominence during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: The fourth wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的侄子，在毛泽东晚年期间担任其联络员。
description.en: Mao Zedong's nephew, who served as his liaison during Mao's later years.

description.zh-cn: 曾任清华大学党委副书记，他向毛泽东写的信件成为“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动的导火索之一。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of Tsinghua University. His letter to Mao Zedong was one of the triggers for the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement.

en: Liu Bing's letter to Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 清华大学党委副书记刘冰反映党委书记迟群、副书记谢静宜问题的信件，由邓小平转交毛泽东。毛泽东对信件的批示成为发动“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动的直接原因。
description.en: A letter from Liu Bing, Deputy Secretary of the Tsinghua University Party Committee, reporting issues concerning Party Secretary Chi Qun and Deputy Secretary Xie Jingyi, which was forwarded to Mao Zedong by Deng Xiaoping. Mao's comments on the letter became the direct cause for launching the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement.

nodes.id: 《论全党全国各项工作的总纲（草稿）》

zh-cn: 《论全党全国各项工作的总纲（草稿）》

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1975年领导整顿时制定的三个纲领性文件之一，后在“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动中被批判为“大毒草”。
description.en: One of the three programmatic documents formulated by Deng Xiaoping during the 1975 rectification. It was later criticized as a 'poisonous weed' during the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1975年领导整顿时制定的三个纲领性文件之一，后在“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动中被批判为“大毒草”。
description.en: One of the three programmatic documents formulated by Deng Xiaoping during the 1975 rectification. It was later criticized as a 'poisonous weed' during the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement.

nodes.id: 《关于加快工业发展的若干问题（草稿）》

zh-cn: 《关于加快工业发展的若干问题（草稿）》

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1975年领导整顿时制定的三个纲领性文件之一，后在“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动中被批判为“大毒草”。
description.en: One of the three programmatic documents formulated by Deng Xiaoping during the 1975 rectification. It was later criticized as a 'poisonous weed' during the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement.

description.zh-cn: 1976年4月5日在中华人民共和国首都北京天安门广场发生的，以悼念周恩来为名，实则拥护邓小平、反对四人帮的群众运动。
description.en: A mass movement that took place on April 5, 1976, in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, ostensibly to mourn Premier Zhou Enlai, but also serving as a protest against the Gang of Four and in support of Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世后的中国最高领导人，曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理。
description.en: The paramount leader of China after Mao Zedong's death, serving as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 由时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋、中共中央副主席叶剑英、中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴等人策划，拘捕“四人帮”及其成员的政治事件。
description.en: A political event planned by Hua Guofeng, then First Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, Ye Jianying, Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, and Wang Dongxing, Director of the CCP General Office, to arrest the Gang of Four and their associates.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一。
description.en: A founding marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央办公厅主任，深度参与了粉碎“四人帮”的怀仁堂事变。
description.en: Served as Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and was deeply involved in the Huairentang Incident that smashed the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 指“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循。”的政治方针，由华国锋提出，旨在维持毛泽东时代的政策和思想路线。
description.en: The political principle of 'We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave,' promoted by Hua Guofeng to maintain the policies and ideological line of the Mao Zedong era.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国的领导人之一，是中共第一代和第二代中央领导集体的重要成员。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, an important member of both the first and second generation of CCP central leadership.

en: 3rd Plenary Session of the 10th Central Committee of the CCP

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会第三次全体会议，会议通过了《关于恢复邓小平同志职务的决议》。
description.en: The 3rd Plenary Session of the 10th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, which passed the 'Resolution on Restoring Comrade Deng Xiaoping's Posts'.

en: The great discussion on the criterion of truth

description.zh-cn: 1978年在中国思想理论界展开的一场关于真理标准问题的大讨论，为中共十一届三中全会召开作了思想准备，否定了“两个凡是”。
description.en: A major debate on the criterion for testing truth that unfolded in China's ideological and theoretical circles in 1978. It laid the ideological groundwork for the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th CCP Central Committee and repudiated the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记，是推动真理标准大讨论的重要领导人之一。
description.en: Served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and was a key leader in promoting the great discussion on the criterion of truth.

en: 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议，被认为是中华人民共和国历史上具有转折性意义的会议，标志着改革开放的开始。
description.en: The 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, considered a pivotal meeting in the history of the People's Republic of China, marking the beginning of the Reform and Opening-up era.

description.zh-cn: 1978年中共十一届三中全会后，中国开始实行的以对内改革、对外开放为核心的政策。
description.en: The policy centered on internal reforms and opening up to the outside world, implemented by China after the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th CCP Central Committee in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东因对邓小平主持的整顿工作及对文化大革命的态度不满，决定发动一场政治运动来解决邓小平的所谓“右倾”问题。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the rectification work led by Deng Xiaoping and his attitude towards the Cultural Revolution, Mao Zedong decided to launch a political movement to address Deng's supposed 'right-deviationist' issues.

description.zh-cn: “批邓、反击右倾翻案风”是文化大革命末期的最后一次大规模政治运动，是文革政治路线的延续。
description.en: 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' was the last large-scale political movement of the late Cultural Revolution, a continuation of its political line.

description.zh-cn: 该运动旨在批判邓小平，并导致其于1976年4月7日被撤销党内外一切职务。
description.en: The movement was aimed at criticizing Deng Xiaoping and led to the removal of all his posts inside and outside the Party on April 7, 1976.

description.zh-cn: 作为毛泽东的联络员，毛远新多次向毛泽东汇报邓小平对文化大革命的态度，直接促使毛泽东下决心发动该运动。
description.en: As Mao Zedong's liaison, Mao Yuanxin repeatedly reported to Mao on Deng Xiaoping's attitude towards the Cultural Revolution, directly prompting Mao to decide to launch the movement.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东晚年，毛远新担任其与外界的主要联络员。
description.en: In Mao Zedong's later years, Mao Yuanxin served as his primary liaison with the outside world.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东对此信的批示，认为信的矛头对着他，且邓小平偏袒刘冰，此事是“当前两条路线斗争的反映”，成为发动运动的直接导火索。
description.en: Mao Zedong's comments on this letter, believing its spearhead was aimed at him and that Deng Xiaoping was partial to Liu Bing, saw the matter as a 'reflection of the current two-line struggle,' becoming the direct trigger for launching the movement.

description.zh-cn: 刘冰撰写了这封信，反映清华大学领导的问题。
description.en: Liu Bing authored this letter, reflecting on the problems with the leadership of Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平将刘冰的信转交给毛泽东。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping forwarded Liu Bing's letter to Mao Zedong.

relationships.target: 《论全党全国各项工作的总纲（草稿）》

description.zh-cn: 该文件与另外两个文件一起被称为“三株大毒草”，在全国范围内遭到批判。
description.en: This document, along with two others, was labeled one of the 'Three Poisonous Weeds' and was criticized nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 该文件与另外两个文件一起被称为“三株大毒草”，在全国范围内遭到批判。
description.en: This document, along with two others, was labeled one of the 'Three Poisonous Weeds' and was criticized nationwide.

relationships.target: 《关于加快工业发展的若干问题（草稿）》

description.zh-cn: 该文件与另外两个文件一起被称为“三株大毒草”，在全国范围内遭到批判。
description.en: This document, along with two others, was labeled one of the 'Three Poisonous Weeds' and was criticized nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮是该运动的主要推动者，积极批判邓小平并试图借机夺取更多权力。
description.en: The Gang of Four were the main promoters of this movement, actively criticizing Deng Xiaoping and attempting to seize more power.

description.zh-cn: 四五运动被官方定性为“反革命事件”，并被归罪于邓小平，成为撤销其一切职务的直接借口，使“批邓”运动升级。
description.en: The Tiananmen Incident was officially labeled a 'counter-revolutionary incident' and blamed on Deng Xiaoping, serving as a direct pretext for his dismissal from all posts and escalating the 'Criticize Deng' movement.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东提议并最终决定任命华国锋为国务院代总理、中共中央第一副主席、国务院总理，使其成为自己的接班人。
description.en: Mao Zedong proposed and ultimately decided to appoint Hua Guofeng as Acting Premier, First Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Committee, and Premier of the State Council, making him his successor.

description.zh-cn: 在此事件中，江青、张春桥、王洪文、姚文元被隔离审查，标志着四人帮政治集团的覆灭。
description.en: In this incident, Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Wang Hongwen, and Yao Wenyuan were detained for investigation, marking the downfall of the Gang of Four political faction.

description.zh-cn: 粉碎“四人帮”的怀仁堂事变被普遍视为文化大革命结束的标志。
description.en: The Huairentang Incident, which smashed the Gang of Four, is widely regarded as the event that marked the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在粉碎“四人帮”后，华国锋基于“两个凡是”的需要，继续推进“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动，并拒绝为邓小平平反。
description.en: After smashing the Gang of Four, Hua Guofeng, based on the need for the 'Two Whatevers,' continued to advance the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Wind' movement and refused to rehabilitate Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 会议通过决议，恢复邓小平的全部职务，正式结束了该运动。
description.en: The plenum passed a resolution to restore all of Deng Xiaoping's posts, formally ending the movement.

description.zh-cn: 会议通过《关于恢复邓小平同志职务的决议》，恢复了邓小平的全部职务。
description.en: The plenum passed the 'Resolution on Restoring Comrade Deng Xiaoping's Posts,' restoring all of his positions.

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋拒绝邓小平复出的情况下，叶剑英为首的大批军队和老资格领导人纷纷表态支持邓小平复出。
description.en: When Hua Guofeng refused to allow Deng Xiaoping's return, a large number of military and veteran leaders, led by Ye Jianying, expressed their support for Deng's comeback.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央工作会议上提出让邓小平恢复工作的要求。
description.en: At a CCP Central Work Conference, he proposed that Deng Xiaoping be reinstated.

description.zh-cn: 1972年曾向毛泽东上书要求让邓小平出来工作。1977年3月，在中共中央工作会议上再次提出让邓小平恢复工作的要求。
description.en: In 1972, he wrote to Mao Zedong requesting Deng Xiaoping's return to work. In March 1977, he again proposed Deng's reinstatement at a CCP Central Work Conference.

description.zh-cn: 这场讨论在思想上彻底击溃了“两个凡是”的理论基础。
description.en: This discussion thoroughly defeated the theoretical basis of the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是“真理标准大讨论”的主要策划者和支持者之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was one of the main planners and supporters of 'the great discussion on the criterion of truth'.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦是“真理标准大讨论”的主要策划者和支持者之一。
description.en: Hu Yaobang was one of the main planners and supporters of 'the great discussion on the criterion of truth'.

description.zh-cn: 会议之后，邓小平取代华国锋成为中国的实际最高领导人。
description.en: After the plenum, Deng Xiaoping replaced Hua Guofeng as the de facto paramount leader of China.

description.zh-cn: 会议确立了邓小平的领导地位，华国锋的权力被削弱并开始淡出权力核心。
description.en: The plenum established Deng Xiaoping's leadership, weakening Hua Guofeng's power and beginning his fade from the core of power.

description.zh-cn: 这次会议标志着中国进入改革开放时代。
description.en: This plenum marked China's entry into the era of Reform and Opening-up.
